member.name: T:Zelda.Updater.Program
member.summary: The Updater.Stub (Zelda Updater.exe) re-directs the actual updating logic into the shadow-copied Updater.Gui (Zelda.Updater.Gui.exe) assembly. This is required or the Zelda.Updater.Gui.exe and its used dlls would be locked and as such not updateable.
